#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    
 vector<int> v(100);
 
 int d=0,n=0,i=0,j=0,c=0;
 
 while(1)
 {
 scanf("%d %d",&d,&n);
 
 if((d==-1) && (n==-1))
 break;
 else
 {
     
 for(i=0;i<n;++i)
 scanf("%d",&v[i]); 
 
 sort(v.begin(),v.begin()+n);
 
 for(i=0;i<n;)
 {
                 j=i;
                 while(((j+1)<n) && ((v[j+1]-v[i])<=d))
                 ++j;
                 i=j;
                 while(((j+1)<n) && ((v[j+1]-v[i])<=d))
                 ++j;
                 ++c;
                 i=j+1;
   
  
  
  
}       
         
         
        cout<<c<<endl; 
         
         
         
         
}    

c=0;

for(i=0;i<n;++i)
v[i]=0;
}
 
    
    
    
   //cin.sync();
   //cin.get();
   
   return 0; 
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
}
